value: The interface is used for customers to actively query the results of video file recognition, and it is recommended to query every 30 seconds, supporting the query of results from the last three days.

Communication Protocol: HTTP or HTTPS protocol
Request Method: POST method
Character Encoding: utf-8
Parameter Format: All request parameters and response parameters are in JSON format.

Suggested timeout: 7s
The internal processing timeout is 3s, with one retry. Normal request latency is around 5ms.

value.supportProduct:
Chinese video file
English video file
Arabic video file

value.param_description: Company Key. Used for permission authentication, provided by Shumei when activating services.see email for details.

value: The following parameters, except for code, message, and requestId, are all mandatory return parameters when the code returns 1100.

value.param_description:
Here are the translations for the codes:

1100: Success
1101: Video processing
1901: QPS limit exceeded
1902: Invalid parameter
1903: Service failure
1905: Unrecognized content
9101: No permission to operate

1100: Success
1101: Video processing
1901: QPS limit exceeded
1902: Illegal parameter
1903: Service failure
1905: Unrecognized content
9101: No permission to operate

Identification results, possible return values:
PASS: Normal, recommended to release directly
REVIEW: Suspicious, recommended for manual review
REJECT: Violation, recommended to block directly

son.param_description: The audio duration of the video in the current request, measured in seconds, is consistent with the billing quantity. When reviewing videos, if there is a discrepancy between the audio track data and the video duration within the video file, the billing duration will be based on the actual audio track duration. For example, if there is no audio track, the billing duration will be 0.
The number of frame grabs in the current request video is consistent with the billing count. When reviewing videos, the number of frame grabs in the video file.
The number of video frames returned. When returnAllImg=0, it represents the number of risk frames; when returnAllImg=1, it represents the total number of frames.
Video duration

value.param_description: Frame image information risk details. Return when there are risky segments or returnAllImg=1.

son.param_description: Frame capture image address
ShuMei requests a unique identifier.

Risk Description. When riskLevel is PASS, return: Normal. Format: "First-level risk label: Second-level risk label: Third-level risk label" in Chinese. For hits on user-defined lists, return: Hit custom list.
Level 1 Risk Label, returns "normal" when riskLevel is PASS.
Secondary Risk Label, is empty when riskLevel is PASS.
Tier 3 Risk Label, empty when riskLevel is PASS.

Identification results, possible return values:
PASS: Normal, recommended to release directly
REVIEW: Suspicious, recommended for manual review
REJECT: Violation, recommended to intercept directly

Identification results, possible return values:
PASS: Normal, recommended to release directly
REVIEW: Suspicious, recommended for manual review
REJECT: Violation, recommended to block directly
Detailed Risk Information

Risk sources, possible values:
1000: No risk
1001: Textual risk
1002: Visual image risk
Number of faces
Number of portraits

Names and location information of political figures in the image. When a face is detected - face type - multiple faces, there will be multiple array elements, up to 10 (if more than 10, select the 10 with the highest probability).
Face ratio, within the range of 0-1, the larger the value, the higher the proportion of the face.

ID, the same person in the same position in the image has the same ID under different tags.
If the same person appears n times in the image, assign n IDs.
Character Names
Confidence. The optional value is between 0 and 1, the larger the value, the higher the credibility.

The character position information is an array with four values, representing the coordinates of the top-left corner and the bottom-right corner. For example, [207,522,340,567], where 207 represents the x-coordinate of the top-left corner, 522 represents the y-coordinate of the top-left corner, 340 represents the x-coordinate of the bottom-right corner, and 567 represents the y-coordinate of the bottom-right corner.
Item Information. Return the name and location information of the marked or item in the picture.
Item or identifier numbering, ensuring that the same item in the same location has the same number across different labels.
Item Name
Confidence. The optional value is between 0 and 1, the larger the value, the higher the credibility.
Return the QR code address recognized in the image.

Names and location information of the people in the image. When the 'Portrait-Multiple' tag is hit, there will be multiple elements in the array, up to a maximum of 10 (if more than 10, select the top 10 with the highest probability).
ID, ensure that the same person has the same ID across different tags. If the same person appears n times in the image, assign n IDs.

Auxiliary Information

Return the similarity between the current frame image and the previous frame image.
For the initial first frame of the video file, compare it with a pure black background image and the similarity probability value of the previous frame image. The value range is [0-1], the closer the number is to 1, the more similar they are.
Return the QR code address recognized in the image.
